results.title: Avengers NOW!
results.description: Sam Wilson, formerly the Falcon, becomes the All-New Captain America! When Thor proves unworthy, a female God of Thunder rises up! Tony Stark declares himself the Superior Iron Man! Earth's Mightiest Heroes undergo major changes across the board!

results.title: Secret Empire
results.description: Steve Rogers has gone rogue and taken over the United States! It's up to the united forces of the Avengers, the Champions, the X-Men and more to bring down one of their own in the nine-issue limited series written by Nick Spencer!

items.name: All-New Guardians of the Galaxy Annual (2017) #1
All-New Guardians of the Galaxy Annual (2017)

previous.name: Dead No More: The Clone Conspiracy

results.title: Dead No More: The Clone Conspiracy
results.description: The Jackal has returned and initiated the Clone Conspiracy! Spider-Man and his allies must contend with friends and enemies alike back from the dead in a limited series by Dan Slott and Jim Cheung that spills into all of the Spidey titles!

results.title: Secret Wars (2015)
results.description: Time Runs Out. Everything Ends. The Secret Wars commence in May 2015 from Jonathan Hickman and Esad Ribic!

items.name: cover from Age of Ultron Vs. Zombies (2015) #1
story from Age of Ultron Vs. Zombies (2015) #1
cover from Age of Ultron Vs. Zombies (2015) #2
story from Age of Ultron Vs. Zombies (2015) #2

next.name: Dead No More: The Clone Conspiracy

results.title: Spider-Verse
results.description: When the unstoppable Morlun returns, it will take every Spider-Man EVER to stop him! Dan Slott and Olivier Coipel spearhead a massive event that unites wall-crawlers across all universes against a single threat, swinging through Amazing Spider-Man and a web of tie-ins!

results.title: Axis
results.description: The Red Skull has taken over Genosha and stands poised to plunge the planet into World War Hate! The Avengers and X-Men must team-up with each other and some of their greatest foes, but along the way, Inversion changes everything! Anything can happen in this nine-issue event written by Rick Remender with the art of Jim Cheung, Terry Dodson, Adam Kubert and Leinil Yu!

items.name: cover from Loki: Agent of Asgard (2013) #6
story from Loki: Agent of Asgard (2013) #6

results.title: Original Sin
results.description: Earth's Mightiest Heroes discover Uatu, the Watcher, dead on the moon, a murder mystery ensues that will reveal shocking secrets about every major Marvel character! Jason Aaron and Mike Deodato lead the Avengers, Spider-Man, the Hulk and many more on status-quo altering eight-past adventure!

items.name: Original Sin: Secret Avengers Infinite Comic (2014)

results.title: Inhumanity
results.description: Following Infinity, the actions of Black Bolt have affected not only his people, but the entire Marvel Universe, as a new race of Inhumans rises up! Witness change for every major Marvel character, led by Inhuman, a new series from Matt Fraction and Joe Madureira!

results.title: X-Men: Battle of the Atom
results.description: The presence of the original X-Men in the modern day has drawn mutants from the future back in time for a clash that will determine the fate of their race! With the timestream unraveling and civil war on the horizon, this 10-issue event features the talents of Brian Michael Bendis, Jason Aaron, Brian Wood, Frank Cho and many more!

results.title: Infinity
results.description: While the most powerful Avengers journey into outer space in an attempt to unite the universe against the Builders, Thanos attacks the Earth in a six-issue event written by Jonathan Hickman with the art of Jim Cheung, Jerome Opena and Dustin Weaver! Featuring the Guardians of the Galaxy, the Inhumans and many more!

results.title: Age of Ultron
results.description: In a 10-issue event written by Brian Michael Bendis with art by Bryan Hitch, Carlos Pacheco, Brandon Peterson and more, the heroes of the Marvel Universe have already fallen with the robot Ultron remaking the world in his image. The surviving Avengers, X-Men and others must fight through time and space in the hope of defeating their foe by any means necessary!

items.name: cover from Avengers: Age of Ultron (2013) #6
story from Avengers: Age of Ultron (2013) #6
cover from Avengers: Age of Ultron (2013) #7
story from Avengers: Age of Ultron (2013) #7

story from Avengers: Age of Ultron (2013) #2 (ULTRON VARIANT)

results.title: Marvel NOW!
results.description: The greatest creators in comics bring the best characters to life monthly in Marvel NOW! Get all the latest on who will be shining as the Marvel Universe continues to push the envelope every month!

results.title: Avengers VS X-Men
results.description: A 12-issue event written by the unprecedented team of Brian Michael Bendis, Jason Aaron, Jonathan Hickman, Ed Brubaker and Matt Fraction with art by the blockbuster trio of John Romita Jr., Olivier Coipel and Adam Kubert, Avengers VS X-Men brings Marvel's biggest characters up against the greatest threat they've ever faced: each other!

results.title: Shattered Heroes
results.description: Welcome to Shattered Heroes, a bold new beginning featuring the Avengers, The Hulk, the Defenders and more as they carve out new roles in the Marvel Universe. Prepare for new teams, new heroes and new threats like youâ€™ve never seen before!

results.title: X-Men: Regenesis
results.description: In the aftermath of X-Men: Schism, the Children of the Atom have split, with Cyclops and his team remaining on Utopia while Wolverine has returned to Westchester and opened the Jean Grey School for Higher Learning. Follow the new stage of evolution for Marvel's mutants in X-Men: Regenesis!

results.title: Spider-Island
results.description: This summer, heroes, villains and ordinary people across Manhattan gain spider abilities, but not all realize that with great power comes great responsibility! Can Spider-Man keep the peace? Dan Slott spearheads this arachna-tastic event in the pages of Amazing Spider-Man!

items.name: Amazing Spider-Man (1999) #665 (AMAZING SPIDER-MAN 665 I AM CAPTAIN AMERICA VARIANT)
Black Panther: The Most Dangerous Man Alive  (2010) #524
BLACK PANTHER: THE MOST DANGEROUS MAN ALIVE - THE KINGPIN OF WAKANDA TPB (Trade Paperback)

Spider-Island: Deadly Hands of Kung Fu (2011)
Spider-Island: I Love New York City (2011)

results.title: Point One
results.description: A great jumping on point for new readers setting up new stories and conflicts for Marvel's top heroes!

results.title: X-Men: Schism
results.description: A new Hellfire Club unleashes Sentinels on Utopia and causes a split in the X-Men! While Cyclops would mobilize the youth of mutantkind against those who would threaten them, Wolverine seeks to teach the next generation a new way. Writer Jason Aaron and an unparalleled team of artists explore this turning point in X-Men history with a five-issue event!

results.title: Fear Itself
results.description: The Serpent, God of Fear and brother to the Allfather Odin, rises to challenge Earthâ€™s Mightiest in a seven-issue event written by Matt Fraction with art by Stuart Immonen! As the Worthy, heralds of the Serpent, lay waste to the Marvel Universe, how can Thor, Captain America, Iron Man and the Avengers turn back the tide of fear?

items.name: Black Panther: The Man Without Fear (2010) #521
Black Panther: The Man Without Fear (2010) #522
Black Panther: The Man Without Fear (2010) #523
Black Panther: The Man Without Fear (2010 - 2011)
Fear Itself: Youth in Revolt (2011 - Present)

results.title: Age of X
results.description: In a strange reality where the X-Men never came to be, the war between humans and mutants has escalated to a level never before seen. What has become of our heroes and who will survive as the final war commences?

results.title: Chaos War
results.description: When the Chaos King embarks on a campaign to wipe out all of existence, Hercules gathers the God Squad to stand in his way! Writers Greg Pak and Fred Van Lente join artist Khoi Pham to pit Herc and his rag tag teamâ€”including Thor, the Silver Surfer and Amadeus Choâ€”against an all-powerful evil as dead heroes and villains rise around them!

results.title: Shadowland
results.description: Matt Murdock dared evil ... and lost! The battle for the soul of a hero begins! Pushed beyond his limits, Daredevil faces off for a final time against his deadliest foe--Bullseye--in their most brutal battle ever with more than just Hell's Kitchen is at stake. Spider-Man, Luke Cage, Iron Fist, Punisher and more join forces to stop a war that is breaking out throughout New York, with Daredevil at the center. This event will change the streets of New York City--and the heroes that protect it--forever.

results.title: The Thanos Imperative
results.description: A realm where death has become extinct bleeds into our reality, and in order to stop it the Guardians of the Galaxy must recruit one of their greatest enemies: Thanos! This six-issue event written by Dan Abnett and Andy Lanning with art by Miguel Sepulveda chronicles if the Marvel Universeâ€™s most notorious murderer will find redemption or doom all that live!

results.title: Heroic Age
results.description: Still lurking in the shadows are forces of evil and cosmic-level threats, but a new spirit of hope, courage, and the selflessness at the heart of heroism will rise up. The most extraordinary tales will be told in this Heroic Age of the Marvel Universe.

results.title: X-Men: Second Coming
results.description: Cable and Hope have returned to the present, but will it be too late to save mutantkind as Bastion unleashes his final assault on the X-teams?

items.name: Interior Story 1 From X-Men: Second Coming (2010)
X-Men: Second Coming - Revelations: Blind Science (2010)

results.title: Realm of Kings
results.description: The fallout from the epic battle between Black Bolt and Vulcan has opened a tear in the universe and into the mysterious Fault. What bizarre menaces now face Nova, the Guardians of the Galaxy, the Inhumans and the Imperial Guard?

items.name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 4:  Realm of Kings (Hardcover)
Nova Vol. 6: Realm of Kings (Trade Paperback)
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 4:  Realm of Kings (2010)
Nova Vol. 6: Realm of Kings (2010 - Present)
Realm of Kings: Son of Hulk (2010)

results.title: Siege
results.description: When Norman Osborn gathers his evil Cabal to attack Asgard, Captain America leads the Avengers to end the Dark Reign! In a four-issue event written by Brian Michael Bendis with art by Olivier Coipel, Earth's Mightiest reunite to oppose their dark counterparts and kick start a Heroic Age!

results.title: Fall of the Hulks
results.description: The Leader, M.O.D.O.K. and their allies in the Intelligencia launch their ultimate plan to defeats the Hulks! Unfortunately the good guys, Bruce Banner's a powerless, Skaar's a wild card and Red Hulk can't be trusted.

results.title: Messiah War
results.description: X-Force has traveled years into the future to aid Cable against his greatest foe, Stryfe, with the life of Hope, the mutant messiah, in the balance!

results.title: War of Kings
results.description: In an effort to punish the Skrulls for their attempted Invasion, the Inhumans chase down a Skrull vessel, only to accidentally destroy a Shi'Ar ship instead, enraging the Shi'Ar emperor, the powerful mutant Vulcan. The Inhumans find themselves allied with the Kree against a Vulcan-led Shi'Ar incursion.
